Told Doctor #p1022006# what the villagers of #m102000000# talked about. Could #o3220000# mentioned by #p1020000# be the same tree Doctor #p1022006# is looking for?
Have you heard the rumors?\r\n#b#L0#What rumors?#l
There are rumors about the Ghost Tree roaming around Perion.\r\n#b#L0#A Ghost Tree? Could there really be a Ghost Tree?#l\n#L1#No way~ ghosts don't exist.#l

I guess so. I don't believe the rumors either. However, I've also heard of something else. There is a legend of a tree that has grown in Perion since the olden days. You must have heard about it, right?\r\n#b#L0#Well... I don't recall...#l

Well, if the tree in question were actually real, then it'd help my research a lot. That said, I don't have enough evidence. Not many know about this particular tree. The Indians of Perion seem to know something, but they won't answer my questions.\r\n#b#L0#Could they be hiding something?#l
This is why I need your help. I've heard you're closer to the Perion Indians than I am. Would you please help and collect information about that tree?
Of course there isn't anything like it!
I see your curiosity got the better of you. In that case start your journey to #b#m102000000##k and find someone who knows about the tree. Anyone must have heard about the tree at least once.
Try talking to #b#p1020000#, #p1022007#, #p1022002#, and #p1022000##k. All right! Wouldn't the botanist, Doctor #b#p1032104##k in #m101000000#, know something about the tree?
Where has your thriving curiosity gone? If you thought it was bothersome, then why didn't you say so in the first place? What a waste of time.
Have you found something? Well, what is it?\r\n#b#L0#I didn't have much luck.#l\n#L1#But I did hear some interesting stories.#l

(Told Doctor Winston of what I heard from the Perion residents.)


Hmm... so the rumor must be #b'#o3220000#'#k? You've done well.
You may go now, but please don't go too far. I may need to reach you for your help on this rumor.
It can't be. There must be someone who knows about it. Keep asking questions.
I can't stop thinking about the story of the old tree. How did it go with the villagers?
